author: huyenltnguyen
message:
feat(client): display FSD in multi-level accordion (#56941)

Co-authored-by: Oliver Eyton-Williams <ojeytonwilliams@gmail.com>

files.patch: @@ -1704,6 +1704,73 @@ "Through a blend of interactive lessons, coding exercises, and real-world projects, you will master both frontend and backend development. You'll work with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript to build responsive user interfaces, explore React and TypeScript for advanced web applications, and learn to manage data with relational databases - and on the backend, you'll use Git, Npm, Node.js, and Python to create powerful server-side solutions.", "By the end of this course, you'll have the practical skills and experience to confidently develop
